DOC.brief_summary: Rehabilitative Ultrasound Imaging ( US ) procedure use evaluate skeletal muscle size function inform clinical practice . US show reliable valid tool measuring change trunk muscle ( i.e . abdominal back muscle ) size activity sub-maximal contraction young population . Younger adult low back pain compare healthy adult without pain demonstrate small back muscle size , low back muscle activity , great back muscle asymmetry ( difference right side compare left side ) . No trial publish evaluate muscle adaptation use US response clinical treatment low back pain older adult population . Increased muscle size improve muscle symmetry report young adult low back pain participate low back stabilization exercise . These exercise use voluntary contraction back muscle prolong hold time low load . Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) treatment modality increase muscle activity voluntary activity impair increase muscle size . Most study assess muscle size activity response NMES conduct knee muscle ( i.e . quadriceps ) , impact NMES back muscle remain relatively unexplored . Given potential evaluate back muscle size activity US , assessment tool may use document muscle adaptation clinical intervention old adult low back pain . The purpose study conduct 6-week clinical trial determine NMES plus lumbar stabilization exercise superior lumbar stabilization exercise improve back muscle size , activity , side-to-side ( i.e . right side versus leave side ) symmetry old adult chronic low back pain ( i.e . low back pain great 3 month ) . Muscle size , activity , symmetry assess use US treatment determine treatment positively impact muscle . Secondary clinical measure success include improvement physical , psychological , social function pre- post-treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Trunk Muscle Size Function Older Adults With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: This study use sample consist 36 , Englishspeaking Englishreading , old male female adult ( age 6085 year ) chronic low back pain , i.e . pain great 3 month duration . During examination , potential participant must 2/4 follow inclusion , base previous work Hicks et al , outline clinical predictor success trunk muscle stabilization exercise program : 1 . FearAvoidance Beliefs Questionnaire ( FABQ ) Physical Activity SubScale score ≥9 : The FABQ measure individual 's beliefs regard impact physical activity work his/her low back pain . The FABQ comprise two subscales : physical activity work . Higher FABQ score show predict pain disability individual chronic low back pain . 2 . Aberrant Movement : Aberrant movement may classify one following : ( 1 ) `` instability catch '' , define deviation plane movement flexion extension ; ( 2 ) `` thigh climbing '' , define use hand push thigh assist obtain upright trunk position ; ( 3 ) `` painful arc motion '' , flex return upright flexed spinal position ; ( 4 ) `` reversal lumbopelvic rhythm '' , trunk first extend hip pelvis extend bring body upright flexed position . 3 . PosteriortoAnterior Segmental Hypermobility : The participant lie his/her stomach examiner apply posteriortoanterior ( backtofront ) force spinous process S1 T12 ( beltline rib cage ) . The available mobility grade hypermobile ( much motion ) , normal , hypomobile ( little motion ) . 4 . Positive Prone Instability Test : The participant lie his/her stomach leg edge table foot rest floor . The examiner apply posteriortoanterior pressure spinous process ( T12S1 ) . Any provocation pain require participant lift legs floor pressure reapplied painful level . If pain subsides elevation leg , consider positive test . Exclusion criteria participant include ( 1 ) history low back surgery ; ( 2 ) recent trauma ( i.e . motor vehicle accident , fall , etc . ) ; ( 3 ) receipt service low back pain within last 6 month ; ( 4 ) nonambulatory severely impaired mobility ( i.e . use assistive device great cane ) ; ( 5 ) severe hear visual impairment ; ( 6 ) nonmechanical low back pain ; ( 7 ) neurological disorder ; ( 8 ) presence acute illness ; ( 9 ) diagnosis scoliosis ; ( 10 ) symptom relate back knee ; ( 11 ) presence pacemaker ; ( 12 ) participation R21 clinical trial ongoing UD PT Clinic ; ( 13 ) inability participate study full six week know reason ( i.e . move away , extended vacation ) . Potential participant also exclude evaluation follow find : 1. score < 24 Folstein MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) : As score great equal 24 may identify individual cognitively intact , screen tool exclude old adult questionable reliability ( i.e . consistency ) selfreport questionnaire secondary cognitive impairment . 2 . Modified Oswestry Low Back Pain Questionnaire ( mOSW ) score < 14 percent : This questionnaire exclude individual chronic low back pain demonstrate minimal low back painrelated disability . Individuals minimal disability may representative seek outpatient physical therapy service back pain . 3 . Facial Pain ScaleRevised ( FPSR ) `` bad '' low back pain rating last 24 hour < 3/10 : Pain rating ≥ 3/10 used hope recruit group individual may representative likely seek clinical service low back pain . Also , FPSRs ( `` current '' , `` best '' , `` bad '' ) use document impact treatment selfreported pain . 4 . Inability tolerate lie belly legs straight : This requirement standardize position ultrasound .
